website_summaries.verdict: A good price on a fast moving fishing float tube that can perform well in rough waters.
pros: D-rings under the seats allow you to attach straps
cons: Designed to hold 250 pounds, which is less than some other fishing float tubes on the market

customer_reviews.title: Good for bass fishing, just get good fins.
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer for bass fisherman. I love that I can walk from my truck a short distance to a spot with it fully inflated. I already have my waiters and boots on, I just walk to the shore slap on my fins and shove off. I can now get to the shore areas where the fish like to hold up and as a result I’m catching a lot more fish. Always wear a PFD, stuff happens fast and once your waders fill up you can’t get back on the tube. Be safe out there and tight lines y’all!
customer_reviews.author: Bass lover 650

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Overall float tube is great. I wish I would have known that it does not work well in cold weather. I used the tube once and it worked beautifully before the lake froze over. Stored it partly inflated to use it the next year in CO. Went to inflate it and had over 20 holes in the bladders. The bladders on this particular model become brittle in freezing weather; any crease developed into a hole. I contacted outcast and their customer service is impeccable and they warrantied the bladder and had them replaced. They had notified me that the fat cat series have a urethane bladder that hold up better in freezing temps.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice float tube
customer_reviews.text: The float tube could use more D rings on the sides to attach rod leashes and fishing nets along with other things. The foam for the seat was a tight fit but with time it went in ok. Plan to use it this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: redfeather a

customer_reviews.title: Floats higher and propels far easier
customer_reviews.text: Own two older float tubes both considered to be state of the art in their day. This tube blows them away. A bit heavier than standard float tubes, but floats higher and propels far easier. Sitting higher does expose the tube to the wind however. Thicker bottom seems to give more protection from punctures. Inflates much quicker and easer. Overall, I consider this tube a real winner!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Snider

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband to replace another type he has had for a few years. He says this one is far superior, you sit up out of the water and it’s easier to maneuver. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good boat but hard to store in a small space.
customer_reviews.text: Great valves. Good flotation but stiff foam in seat and backrest make it take up lots of space when deflated. Having it to do again I'd spend the extra cost of the version that has an inflatable/deflatable seat.
customer_reviews.author: JR12

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just got back into float tubing, this is so much better than my old one from 15 years ago. You sit up higher rather than in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: new toy
customer_reviews.text: loved my boat and the big pockets. the back rest needs constant adjusting but other wise it was great
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Float Tube
customer_reviews.text: Great float tube! Provided many glorious days with my son. Hundreds of largemouth bass caught and released at our favorite Sonoma County secret spot.
customer_reviews.author: alexander morast

customer_reviews.title: Awesome float tube
customer_reviews.text: Love it can't wait to be floating in my local lake again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All around great. It's know as one of the top tubes ...
customer_reviews.text: All around great. It's know as one of the top tubes for a reason. No complaints, you sit nice and high out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Great storage in the armrest zipper compartments for tackle boxes ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had 2 of these for years, needed a 3rd. We use them a lot, in Dana Point Harbor and on the Colorado River & nearby inlets. Very durable, very maneuverable. Great storage in the armrest zipper compartments for tackle boxes and water/phone/knife/stringer/bait. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR BACK SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the 250 lb capacity, I'm 230. But the back support is very poor and difficult to adjust due to cheap buckles. Fished Lake Heenan this Friday and had an uncomforable experience with back fatigue, generally a poor design and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Norman M.

product_meta.title: Outcast Fishcat 4-LCS
product_meta.description: Description: This is one of the best selling float tubes in the USA for good reason it s comfortable you sit above the water for better casting distance and it is affordable The Fish Cat 4 LCS has a foam seat and seat back 2 big cargo pockets and an adjustable shipping apron for controlling your line The Fish Cat 4 has a new color for 2013 The all olive pack cloth top teamed with the grey PVC bottom tube will blend into any fishing situation When you re looking for quality product at an affordable price the Fish Cat 4 is second to none The Fish Cat 4 LCS is for you if: You love to still water fish in lakes ponds and reservoirs You want your knees to be up out of the water You want your knees to be up out of the water You consider yourself a recreational angler who gets out on the water between 1 25 days a year You want an affordable do everything float tube Boat Specifications: Inflated Size: 44 x 54 Tube Diameter: 12 Fabric: 420 PC 500 PVC Material Weight: 30 oz sq yd AireCell Material: Vinyl Seam Construction: Sewn Warranty: 5 Valve Type: 2 Boston Weight: 14 lbs Load Capacity: 250 lbs
feature_bullets: Outcast Fish Cat 4 LCS - Olive - Float Tube
